item.title: HOOPS SCOUTING USA 10-K
item.description: HOOPS SCOUTING USA, which is in the Services-Computer Processing & Data Preparation [7374] industry, SEC 10-K filing on October 05, 2021 had 6577 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 129 instances financial - 106 instances 30 - 95 instances statements - 74 instances 2021 - 69 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
